TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseCompareValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator
Public MustInherit Class BaseCompareValidator Inherits BaseValidator

summary.span: 作為執行具類型比較之驗證控制項的抽象基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls that perform typed comparisons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會由驗證控制項的比較值，例如繼承和控制項，以提供基本的通用功能。The class is inherited by validation controls that compare values, such as the and controls, to provide basic common functionality. 使用屬性來指定資料類型，這些值進行比較之前，會轉換成。Use the property to specify the data type that that the values are converted to before being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果已驗證的輸入控制項的值無法轉換成指定的資料類型，則驗證失敗。If the value of the input control being validated cannot be converted to the specified data type, validation fails. 驗證控制項的屬性設定為`false`。The property of the validation control is set to `false`. 類別也包含數個靜態屬性和執行比較驗證時非常實用的方法。The class also contains several static properties and methods that are useful when performing comparison validations. 您可以決定是否將字串可以轉換成特定的資料類型使用方法。You can determine whether a string can be converted to a specific data type by using the method. 中包含可以由兩位數年份的最大年份屬性。The maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year is contained in the property. 方法可讓您將兩位數年份轉換為四位數年份。The method allows you to convert a two-digit year to a four-digit year. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用驗證器控制項衍生自內控制控制，請確定驗證程式控制項以及與其相關聯的控制項是在相同的面板。When you use validator controls that derive from the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 如需有關使用控制局部網頁更新，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 如需有關驗證控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about validation controls, see . ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是抽象的您無法建立直接物件。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 這個建構函式來初始化中定義的屬性在衍生類別的建構函式通常稱為類別。This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void AddAttributesToRender (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

override this.AddAttributesToRender : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter -> unit

param.name: writer
param.span: ，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 將需要呈現給控制項的 HTML 屬性和樣式加入至指定的 物件中。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來呈現控制項的 HTML 標記中控制項的屬性。The method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control. 這個方法通常會覆寫由控制項開發人員在衍生類別中插入適當的屬性和樣式以控制項的輸出資料流。This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for a control.

span.para: 在覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底類別中的對應方法。否則，將不會轉譯的基底類別中包含的屬性。
When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class. Otherwise, the attributes contained in the base class will not be rendered.

summary.span: 這個版本的多載方法使用目前文化特性所使用的格式來測試貨幣值、雙精度浮點數值和日期值。

span.span: This version of the overloaded method tests currency, double, and date values using the format used by the current culture.

returns.span: 如果指定的資料型別可以轉換成指定的資料型別，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified data string can be converted to the specified data type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷是否可以轉換為指定的資料類型指定的字串。Use the method to determine whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type. 這個方法通常用於測試是否字串可以之前執行的作業取決於該資料類型會轉換成相容的資料類型。This method is commonly used to test whether a string can be converted to a compatible data type before performing an operation that depends on that data type. 這個版本的方法測試使用目前文化特性所使用的格式的值。This version of the method tests the value using the format used by the current culture. 若要測試使用的文化特性中性格式的值，請使用多載版本，這個方法。To test the value using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來比較兩個整數值，並判斷是否可以轉換的第二個整數。The following example demonstrates using the method to compare two integer values and determine whether the second integer can be converted. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert/CS/basecomparevalidatorcanconvertcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseCompareValidatorCanConvert/VB/basecomparevalidatorcanconvertvb.aspx#1)]

returns.span: 如果指定的資料型別可以轉換成指定的資料型別，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified data string can be converted to the specified data type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷是否可以轉換為指定的資料類型指定的字串。Use the method to determine whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type. 這個方法通常用於測試是否字串可以之前執行的作業取決於該資料類型會轉換成相容的資料類型。This method is commonly used to test whether a string can be converted to a compatible data type before performing an operation that depends on that data type. 若要指示應該使用的文化特性中性格式來測試值，請傳入`true`如`cultureInvariant`參數; 否則則在測試值使用目前文化特性所使用的格式。To indicate that values should be tested using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariant` parameter; otherwise, values are tested using the format used by the current culture. 當測試值，使用目前文化特性所使用的格式，請考慮使用多載版本，這個方法。When testing a value using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

span.span: if the parameter relates to the parameter in the manner specified by the parameter; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來測試是否值`leftText`參數的值則是與`rightText`參數所指定的方式`op`參數。The method is used to test whether the value of the `leftText` parameter relates to the value of the `rightText` parameter in the manner specified by the `op` parameter. `type`參數會指定要比較的值的資料類型。The `type` parameter specifies the data type of the values being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果`op`參數設定為`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，這個方法會測試的值`leftText`參數所指定之資料類型`type`參數。If the `op` parameter is set to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, this method tests only the value of the `leftText` parameter for the data type specified by the `type` parameter. `rightText`參數已忽略。The `rightText` parameter is ignored. 這個版本的方法會比較使用目前文化特性所使用的格式的值。This version of the method compares the values using the format used by the current culture. 若要比較的值，使用文化特性中性的格式，使用多載版本，這個方法。To compare the values using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來測試是否值`leftText`參數的值則是與`rightText`參數所指定的方式`op`參數。The method is used to test whether the value of the `leftText` parameter relates to the value of the `rightText` parameter in the manner specified by the `op` parameter. `type`參數會指定要比較的值的資料類型。The `type` parameter specifies the data type of the values being compared. > [!NOTE] > 如果`op`參數設定為`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，這個方法會測試的值`leftText`參數所指定之資料類型`type`參數。If the `op` parameter is set to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, this method tests only the value of the `leftText` parameter for the data type specified by the `type` parameter. `rightText`參數已忽略。The `rightText` parameter is ignored. 若要指示應該使用的文化特性中性格式來比較值，請傳入`true`如`cultureInvariantLeftText`和`cultureInvariantRightText`參數; 否則會比較值使用目前文化特性所使用的格式。To indicate that values should be compared using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariantLeftText` and `cultureInvariantRightText` parameters; otherwise, the values are compared using the format used by the current culture. 當比較值使用目前文化特性所使用的格式，請考慮使用多載版本，這個方法。When comparing values using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

returns.span: 如果轉換成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the conversion is successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來將文字轉換成指定的資料類型的物件。The method is used to convert text into an object of the specified data type. 雖然此方法會傳回`true`或`false`表示轉換是否成功，已轉換的值會儲存在`value``out`參數。Although the method returns `true` or `false` to indicate whether the conversion was successful, the converted value is stored in the `value` `out` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果轉換成功，`value`參數設定為`null`。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the `value` parameter is set to `null`. 這個版本的方法將使用目前文化特性所使用的格式的值轉換。This version of the method converts values using the format used by the current culture. 若要轉換使用的文化特性中性格式的值，使用多載版本，這個方法。To convert values using a culture-neutral format, use the overloaded version of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來將文字轉換成指定的資料類型的物件。The method is used to convert text into an object of the specified data type. 雖然此方法會傳回`true`或`false`表示轉換是否成功，已轉換的值會儲存在`value``out`參數。Although the method returns `true` or `false` to indicate whether the conversion was successful, the converted value is stored in the `value` `out` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果轉換成功，`value`參數設定為`null`。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the `value` parameter is set to `null`. 若要指示應該使用的文化特性中性格式來轉換值，請傳入`true`如`cultureInvariant`參數; 否則值會轉換使用目前文化特性所使用的格式。To indicate that values should be converted using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariant` parameter; otherwise, values are converted using the format used by the current culture. 當使用目前文化特性所使用的格式將值轉換，請考慮使用多載版本，這個方法。When converting a value using the format used by the current culture, consider using the overloaded version of this method.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示在對值進行比較之前是否將值轉換成文化特性中性的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether values are converted to a culture-neutral format before being compared.

value.span: 表示在對值進行比較之前將其轉換成文化特性中性的格式，否則為 。預設值為 。

span.span: to convert values to a culture-neutral format before they are compared; otherwise, .The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，控制項的屬性，並不強型別進行比較之前，會轉換成文化特性中性的格式。When the property is set to `true`, properties of the control that are not strongly typed are converted to a culture-neutral format before being compared. 當這個屬性設定為`false`，值會轉換成目前的文化特性的格式。When this property is set to `false`, values are converted to the format of the current culture. 屬性不會影響在網頁上控制項的使用者所輸入的值。The property does not affect values that are entered by users of the control on a Web page. 無法設定這個屬性，由主題或樣式表主題。This property cannot be set by themes or by style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

value.span: 兩位數年份可代表的最大年份。

span.span: The maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷可表示以兩位數年份的 100 年範圍的最大年份。Use the property to determine the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year in a 100-year range. 例如，如果此屬性包含值`2029`，您可以表示 2029 年 1930年使用兩位數年份。For example, if this property contains the value `2029`, you can represent the years 1930 to 2029 using a two-digit year. 兩位數年份 30 被解譯為 1930，而 29 解譯為 2029年。The two-digit year 30 is interpreted as 1930, while 29 is interpreted as 2029. 您無法直接; 變更這個屬性的值不過，您可以變更可以藉由設定以二位數年份表示的最大年份屬性。You cannot change the value of this property directly; however, you can change the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year by setting the property.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool DetermineRenderUplevel ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool DetermineRenderUplevel() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function DetermineRenderUplevel () As Boolean
protected: override bool DetermineRenderUplevel();
override this.DetermineRenderUplevel : unit -> bool

summary.span: 判斷是否可將驗證控制項呈現給較新版本 (上層) 的瀏覽器。

span.span: Determines whether the validation control can be rendered for a newer ("uplevel") browser.

returns.span: 如果可將驗證器控制項呈現給「上層」瀏覽器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the validation control can be rendered for an "uplevel" browser; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 函式，主要是供屬性來判斷用戶端瀏覽器是否支援"新版"呈現 （較新的瀏覽器上呈現）。The method is a helper function used primarily by the property to determine whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering (rendering on a newer browser). 類別會覆寫此方法以傳回`false`如果目前的文化特性使用非西曆。The class overrides this method to return `false` if the current culture uses a non-Gregorian calendar. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

span.para: 在覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底類別中的對應方法。否則，將會略過的基底類別中定義的條件。
When overriding the method, be sure to call the corresponding method in the base class. Otherwise, conditions defined in the base class will be bypassed.

.method familystatic hidebysig string GetDateElementOrder() cil managed
Protected Shared Function GetDateElementOrder () As String
protected: static System::String ^ GetDateElementOrder();
static member GetDateElementOrder : unit -> string

summary.span: 判斷月、日和年在目前文化特性的日期值中出現的順序。

span.span: Determines the order in which the month, day, and year appear in a date value for the current culture.

returns.span: 字串，表示月、日和年在目前文化特性的日期值中出現的順序。

span.span: A string that represents the order in which the month, day, and year appear in a date value for the current culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 月、 日和年的日期值會以不同的順序，根據目前文化特性設定而定。The month, day, and year of a date value can appear in different orders depending on the current culture settings. 方法用來判斷這些值會出現的順序。The method is used to determine the order in which these values appear. 下表顯示不同的值，這個方法所傳回。The following table shows the different values returned by this method. |日期項目順序Date element order|傳回值Return value| |------------------------|------------------| |日、 月、 年Day, Month, Year|「 dmy""dmy"| |月、 日、 年Month, Day, Year|「 mdy""mdy"| |Year，Month，DayYear, Month, Day|「 ymd""ymd"|

MemberSignature.Value: protected static int GetFullYear (int shortYear);
.method familystatic hidebysig int32 GetFullYear(int32 shortYear) cil managed
Protected Shared Function GetFullYear (shortYear As Integer) As Integer
protected: static int GetFullYear(int shortYear);
static member GetFullYear : int -> int

span.span: A two-digit year.

summary.span: 產生指定的兩位數年份的四位數年份表示。

span.span: Generates the four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.

returns.span: 指定的兩位數年份的四位數年份表示。

span.span: The four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來產生指定的兩位數年份的四位數年份表示。Use the method to generate the four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year. 值而定的四位數年份表示屬性，其中包含可以由兩位數字中之年的 100 年範圍的最大年份。The four-digit year representation depends on the value of the property, which contains the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year in a 100-year range. 例如，如果屬性包含值`2029`、方法會傳回一 1930 年和 2029年之間。For example, if the property contains the value `2029`, the method returns a year between 1930 and 2029. 兩位數年份 30 被解譯為 1930，而 29 解譯為 2029年。The two-digit year 30 is interpreted as 1930, while 29 is interpreted as 2029. 您可以變更可以藉由設定以二位數年份表示的最大年份屬性。You can change the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 因為這個方法是`static`，您可以使用它，而不需要建立類別的執行個體來限定方法名稱與類別名稱，例如`BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear`。Because this method is `static`, you can use it without creating an instance of the class by qualifying the method name along with the class name--for example, `BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear`.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType Type { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType Type
Public Property Type As ValidationDataType
public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType Type { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationDataType value); };
member this.Type : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定數值在比較之前要轉換的資料型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the data type that the values being compared are converted to before the comparison is made.
One of the enumeration values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定用於比較的資料類型。Use the property to specify the data type used for comparison. 屬性在不同的比較驗證控制項中有不同的使用方式。The property is used differently by the various comparison validation controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當屬性設定為目前的月曆類型和非西曆，驗證程式會執行伺服器端驗證。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 驗證程式的用戶端指令碼僅支援西曆日曆。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 例如，在執行任何比較之前，將會轉換成指定的資料類型的控制項，所有值進行比較 （上限、 下限和輸入控制項的值）。For example, in the control, all values being compared (the upper bound, lower bound, and value of the input control) are converted to the specified data type before any comparison is performed. 不過，如果您使用控制項，並設定其屬性`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，僅輸入控制項的值轉換成指定的資料類型。However, if you use a control and set its property to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, only the value of the input control is converted to the specified data type. > [!NOTE] > 如果驗證控制項相關聯輸入控制項的值無法轉換成指定的資料類型，則驗證失敗。If the value of the input control associated with the validation control cannot be converted to the specified data type, validation fails. 驗證控制項的屬性設定為`false`。The property of the validation control is set to `false`. 下表列出您可以使用的值屬性。The following table lists the values that you can use for the property. |資料類型Data type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|指定字串資料類型。Specifies a string data type.| |`Integer`|指定 32 位元帶正負號的整數資料類型。Specifies a 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|指定雙精確度浮點數資料型別。Specifies a double-precision floating-point number data type.| |`Date`|指定日期資料類型。Specifies a date data type.| |`Currency`|指定貨幣資料類型。Specifies a monetary data type.| 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要比較的值進行比較之前會轉換成資料類型。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data type that the values being compared are converted to before the comparison is made. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的資料型別不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified data type is not one of the values.
